extensionDescription.message: 2025 Setup new themes, pieces, fonts, and boards, remove annoying notifications, popups, and so on.

d_title.message: Sika dɔn de LichessHelper de edi so.

d_subtitle.message: Me de yɛ sɛnea me pɛpɛe, menyɛ nnidi hɔ a, menam a, na menya nnidi hɔ. Sika dɔn mo a ɛdɔnnwom ho ne sɛ mo suport no ma yɛnkasa!

s_effic.message: Sɛnea mohyɛ me efisɛ, mesrɛ wo san kyɛre nkɔm:

s_detail__1.message: LichessHelper version a wopɛ sɛ wo gyae no.

s_detail__2.message: Basa ne ho nti sɛ wopɛ sɛ wo gu akyerɛ no.

s_detail__3.message: Ɔdeta a wopɛ sɛ wo hyɛ.

s_detail__4.message: Wo brausa ne nkuasu (sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ Firefox 86.0).
